SubSections.Title: Carbon Fiber
SubSections.Content: You become immune to sundered.

SubSections.Title: Phase Anchor
SubSections.Content: You become immune to soulbound.

SubSections.Title: Mirror Veil
SubSections.Content: You become immune to revealed.

SubSections.Title: Toxin Filter
SubSections.Content: You become immune to poisoned.

SubSections.Title: Light Ward
SubSections.Content: You become immune to pacified.

SubSections.Title: Aegis Core
SubSections.Content: You become immune to vulnerable.

SubSections.Title: Voided Mesh
SubSections.Content: You become immune to scarred.

SubSections.Title: Spiritual Insulation
SubSections.Content: You become immune to hopeless.

SubSections.Title: Overclocked Neural Net
SubSections.Content: You become immune to confused.

SubSections.Title: Stoneheart Plate
SubSections.Content: You become immune to weakened.

SubSections.Title: Harmonic Stabilizer
SubSections.Content: You become immune to aflame.

SubSections.Title: Frostbound Plate
SubSections.Content: You become immune to freezing.

SubSections.Title: Adaptive Frame
SubSections.Content: You become immune to slowed.

SubSections.Title: Psionic Dampener
SubSections.Content: You become immune to taunted.

SubSections.Title: Temporal Anchors
SubSections.Content: You become immune to paralyzed.

SubSections.Title: Entropic Carapace
SubSections.Content: You become immune to diseased.

SubSections.Title: Bio Reactive Plating
SubSections.Content: You become immune to rotting.

SubSections.Title: Self Repairing Core
SubSections.Content: You become immune to corroding.

SubSections.Title: Stitcher Nanobots
SubSections.Content: You become immune to bleeding.

SubSections.Title: Grav Core
SubSections.Content: You can become or lose anchored as a free action.

SubSections.Title: Warframe
SubSections.Content: You can become or lose prone as a free action.

SubSections.Title: Steel Plating X
SubSections.Content: You gain TX5 slashing damage reduction.

SubSections.Title: Insulated Coating X
SubSections.Content: You gain TX5 shock damage reduction.

SubSections.Title: Ablative Shell X
SubSections.Content: You gain TX5 piercing damage reduction.

SubSections.Title: Frost Shield X
SubSections.Content: You gain TX5 cryo damage reduction.

SubSections.Title: Ablative Shell X
SubSections.Content: You gain TX5 bludgeoning damage reduction.

SubSections.Title: Psychic Barrier X
SubSections.Content: You gain TX5 psychic damage reduction.

SubSections.Title: Resonance Plating X
SubSections.Content: You gain TX5 sonic damage reduction.

SubSections.Title: Molten Guard X
SubSections.Content: You gain TX5 thermal damage reduction.

SubSections.Title: Darksteel Plating X
SubSections.Content: You gain TX5 necrotic damage reduction.

SubSections.Title: Photosynthetic Weave X
SubSections.Content: You gain TX5 metabolism damage reduction.

SubSections.Title: Divine Shell X
SubSections.Content: You gain TX5 holy damage reduction.

SubSections.Title: Demonic Carapace X
SubSections.Content: You gain TX5 unholy damage reduction.

SubSections.Title: Blink Powder
SubSections.Content: You teleport to a point within [Speed] meters.

SubSections.Title: Broken Teleportation Core
SubSections.Content: You teleport to a point within [Range -/ 4] meters.

SubSections.Title: Kinetic Capacitor X
SubSections.Content: You regain TX10 shield.

SubSections.Title: Energy Cell X
SubSections.Content: You regain X1 energy.

SubSections.Title: Purity Serum
SubSections.Content: You lose a condition of your choice.

SubSections.Title: Reconstructor
SubSections.Content: You lose all conditions of your choice.

SubSections.Title: Blink Overdrive
SubSections.Content: You teleport to a point within [Speed * 4] meters.

SubSections.Title: Teleportation Core
SubSections.Content: You teleport to a point within [Range] meters.

SubSections.Title: Time Reverser X
SubSections.Content: You regain TX10 reserved health.

SubSections.Title: Jet Boots
SubSections.Content: You are pushed up to [Speed * 2] meters into a direction of your choice.

SubSections.Title: Reality Eraser
SubSections.Content: You become hidden.

SubSections.Title: Battle Rush X
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, you become strengthened X1 and confused X1.

SubSections.Title: Hyperfocus X
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, you become keen X1 and slowed X1.

SubSections.Title: Adrenal Surge X
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, you become hastened X1 and scarred X1.

SubSections.Title: Infernal Stimulant X
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, you become strengthened X1 and aflame X1.

SubSections.Title: Duskflux X
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, you become regenerating X1 and weakened X1.

SubSections.Title: Psychic Euphoria X
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, you become zealous X1 and weakened X1.

SubSections.Title: Mortal Resolve X
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, you become focused X1 and vulnerable X1.

SubSections.Title: Spiritual Anchor X
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, you become sanctified X1 and poisoned X1.

SubSections.Title: Striking Presence X
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, you become protected X1 and corroding X1.

SubSections.Title: Last Stand X
SubSections.Content: You gain X1 rotting stacks. For 3 rounds, you become resilient X1 and rotting X1.

SubSections.Title: Unholy Pact
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, you gain resistance to unholy and weakness to holy.

SubSections.Title: Psychic Focus
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, you gain resistance to psychic and weakness to sonic.

SubSections.Title: Echoed Mind
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, you gain resistance to sonic and weakness to psychic.

SubSections.Title: Necrotic Infusion
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, you gain resistance to necrotic and weakness to metabolism.

SubSections.Title: Lifeblood Surge
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, you gain resistance to metabolism and weakness to necrotic.

SubSections.Title: Coolant
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, you gain resistance to thermal and weakness to cryo.

SubSections.Title: Boiling Blood
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, you gain resistance to cryo and weakness to thermal.

SubSections.Title: Static Shield
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, you gain resistance to shock and weakness to bludgeoning.

SubSections.Title: Grounded Bulk
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, you gain resistance to bludgeoning and weakness to shock.

SubSections.Title: Razor Hide
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, you gain resistance to slashing and weakness to piercing.

SubSections.Title: Barbed Skin
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, you gain resistance to piercing and weakness to slashing.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Last Breath X

Parts: You fall to 0 health while at least one allied combatant is within 4 meters.

SubSections.Content: You gain TX10 shield and become protected X1 until the end of the round.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Buddha's Palm X

Parts: After you hit a combatant adjacent to a wall or solid object.

SubSections.Content: The damage is increased by TX1d6.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Titan's Barrier
SubSections.Content: You ignore all further damage from this.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Shadow Link

Parts: After you are hit while adjacent to a wall or solid object.

SubSections.Content: You teleport a point within range that is close to a wall or solid object.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Unyielding Guard X

Parts: Before you are hit while having no remaining shield.

SubSections.Content: You reduce the damage taken by TX10.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Riposte X

Parts: You are missed by a combatant within reach.

SubSections.Content: You use a basic melee attack ability against the attacker. The attack gains X1 advantages.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Perfect Timing X

Parts: You hit while you have no shield remaining.

SubSections.Content: You gain TX10 shield.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Unstoppable Charge X

Parts: You move in a straight line for at least 16 meters before hitting an attack.

SubSections.Content: The damage is increased by [(meters moved -/ 10) * X]d6.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Cinder X

Parts: You hit a combatant 3 times within 1 turn.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes aflame X1 for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Fractured Reality

Parts: You hit a combatant with an attack after not moving for 1 round.

SubSections.Content: You teleport a point within [Range -/ 4] meters and become hidden.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Chain Explosion X

Parts: You hit at least 5 combatants with a single attack.

SubSections.Content: The damage is increased by TX1d8.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Isolation X

Parts: You hit a combatant with a melee attack while they are the only combatant within 10 meters.

SubSections.Content: The damage is increased by TX1d6. You become hidden.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Soaring Snake X

Parts: You critically hit the same combatant twice in a row.

SubSections.Content: You become focused X1 and hastened X1 for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Reaper's Step
SubSections.Content: You teleport to its location.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Rebounding Force X

Parts: Before you are pushed by a combatant.

SubSections.Content: You are not pushed instead, and the combatant is pushed up to X2 meters away from you.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Sudden Eruption X

Parts: You take damage from the aflame condition.

SubSections.Content: All combatants within 4 meters take TX5 thermal damage.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Crouching Tiger X

Parts: You hit a combatant after not attacking for 1 long round.

SubSections.Content: The damage is increased by TX1d10 against it.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Shattered Earth
SubSections.Content: The area within 8 meters becomes difficult terrain.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Gluttony
SubSections.Content: You gain [its max health -/ 2] shield.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Lingering Shadows X

Parts: You attack after teleporting at least 3 times within 1 long round.

SubSections.Content: You gain X1 advantages on the attack.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Reckless Defiance X

Parts: You lose health to an attack.

SubSections.Content: Your next attack gains X1 advantages.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Warped Voids X

Parts: After you hit an attack without having moved for 1 long round.

SubSections.Content: You teleport to a point close to the combatant. The damage is increased by TX1d8.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Collateral Damage

Parts: You hit a combatant after not attacking for 1 long round.

SubSections.Content: The attack also targets all combatants within 8 meters of the combatant.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Praying Mantis X

Parts: After you hit a melee attack without having moved or teleported for 1 long round.

SubSections.Content: The damage is increased by TX1d12.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Tactical Recovery X

Parts: You start your turn after being hit at least 3 times within 1 round.

SubSections.Content: You gain TX10 shield.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Crystal Reflection X

Parts: You hit a combatant after being hit at least 3 times within 1 round.

SubSections.Content: The damage is increased by TX1d10.

SubSections.Title: Rune Of Hidden Dragon X

Parts: You attack after not attacking for 2 long rounds.

SubSections.Content: The attack gains X1 advantages and its damage is increased by TX1d6.
